    rotate()
    turns rotors over when we reach a notch, M3 contains a double-step turns rotors over when we reach a notch, Abwehr does not contain a double-step but reflector steps when the left most rotor reaches a notch

  • Method Details

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Get machine type as string
      Returns:
      Returns type of Enigma Machine

    • CreateM3

      public static Enigma CreateM3(String[] rotors, String reflector, int[] rotorPositions, int[] ringSettings, String pegboardConnections)
      M3 Creator Sets rotor positions by creating new rotors and settings
      Parameters:
      rotors - A string array of the names of the rotors to use.
      reflector - A string of the name of the reflector.
      rotorPositions - An int array of the positions of the rotors.
      ringSettings - An int array of the positions of the ring settings.
      pegboardConnections - A string of the plug board connections of the M3.

    • CreateAbwehr

      public static Enigma CreateAbwehr(String[] rotors, int reflectorPosition, int[] rotorPositions, int[] ringSettings)
      Abwehr Creator creates the settings and sets the positions
      Parameters:
      rotors - A string array of the names of the rotors to use.
      reflectorPosition - An int of the positions of the reflector.
      rotorPositions - An int array of the positions of the rotors.
      ringSettings - An int array of the positions of the ring settings.

    • CreateKey

      public static Enigma CreateKey(String model, EnigmaKey key)
      Builds and returns an Enigma object using a passed in EnigmaKey which holds specifications for machine
      Parameters:
      model - Name of enigma machine type.
      key - Configuration settings for the Enigma Machine

    • rotate

      public void rotate()
      turns rotors over when we reach a notch, M3 contains a double-step turns rotors over when we reach a notch, Abwehr does not contain a double-step but reflector steps when the left most rotor reaches a notch

    • encrypt

      public int encrypt(int c)
      Encryption. Takes character in decimal int form and puts through series of translations.
      Parameters:
      c - Character in decimal form to encrypt (normalized to Enigma Keyboard)
      Returns:
      The encrypted character

      Parameters:
